column4: Since I'm not on 10.10 I have no /dev/dsp device and OSS-only applications don't work as OSS was purposely removed from kernel.  I'm told OSS-Proxy is a way to recreate the dev device and pass the audio to PulseAudio but there is no package for installation of it as far as I can see, how do you install it?
no. it's the way alsa allows OSS programs to work for the last ten years.and I doubt alsa was forked just for ubuntu
I don't care about your kernel module - i care about osspd
